meanings.definition: The act of treating someone or something as a god.
meanings.sent1: In ancient times, deifications of powerful rulers were common.
meanings.sent2: The deifications of nature in various cultures show the diversity of beliefs.
meanings.sent3: The deifications of everyday objects in cartoons always make me chuckle.
meanings.sent4: The deifications of celebrities in modern society can be overwhelming.
meanings.sent5: The deifications of mythical creatures in folklore make for fascinating stories.

meanings.definition: The belief in or worship of someone or something as a god.
meanings.sent1: The deifications of ancestors play a significant role in some cultures.
meanings.sent2: Many ancient civilizations had deifications of multiple gods.
meanings.sent3: The deifications of pets by some owners can be quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: The deifications of ideals can shape societies in profound ways.
meanings.sent5: The deifications of historical figures often lead to legends and myths.
